post.text: El emocionante momento cuando la 'dreamer' Lorella Praeli tuvo la oportunidad de votar por primera vez.

comment.author: Mark
comment.text: And Susan Sarandon is saying that Hillary is more dangerous to American than Trump. For shame.

replies.author: Ryleigh
replies.text: a liar can be just as dangerous as a maniac

replies.author: Mark
replies.text: Ryleigh, I get you hate her. I get you probably will never vote for her. And that's fine. But we are talking about HUGE disparities in issues such as climate change, a woman's right to choose, immigration, health care, minimum wage and the SUPREME FREAKING COURT. So, to your point, a "liar" - as you believe her to be - is nowhere near as dangerous as a racist, sexiest, demagogue maniac.
